models.name: Hugging Face API
models.description: Use hosted models via HF token (e.g. distilbert, flan-t5).

models.name: Transformers (local)
models.description: Run local models using transformers pipeline.

models.name: LiteLLM
models.description: Connect to 100+ LLMs with unified API routing.

models.name: OpenAI
models.description: Connect to OpenAI's ChatGPT and GPT-4.

models.name: Anthropic
models.description: Access Claude models via Anthropic token.

models.name: Ollama
models.description: Serve local models like llama2 and phi-2 via Ollama server.

models.name: Together.ai
models.description: Use hosted open source models via Together.ai.

models.name: OpenRouter
models.description: Router for multiple LLM providers under one token.

agents.name: CodeAgent
agents.description: Executes Python code generated by the model.

agents.name: ToolCallingAgent
agents.description: Uses structured tool calls to query external functions.

agents.name: ManagedAgent
agents.description: Controls multiple agents or tool groups hierarchically.
